title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 7.2 - Promotional grades
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 7.2 - Promotional grades

State Regulations

The Civil Service Department shall prescribe appropriate
lines of promotion and grades for promotional purposes for positions in the
competitive class in any agency under the jurisdiction of the department for
which no classification plan has been adopted. The department shall maintain a
record of such prescribed lines of promotion and promotional grades which shall
be open to inspection in the offices of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
7.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
